loyalist.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who continues to support a government or country, especially during a period of change
loyalist.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone from Northern Ireland who believes that Northern Ireland should remain part of the United Kingdom, and not become part of the Republic of Ireland
loyalist.translation[2].definitions[0].d: a Protestant in Northern Ireland who believes that it should remain part of the UK. The people who want Northern Ireland to become part of the Republic of Ireland are called ‘Republicans’ or ‘Nationalists’.
loyalist.translation[2].definitions[1].d: someone who was loyal to the royal family during the English Civil War
loyalist.translation[2].definitions[2].d: someone who supported the elected government during the Spanish Civil War
loyalist.translation[2].definitions[3].d: someone who fought with the British during the American Revolutionary War
loyalist.translation[2].definitions[4].d: someone who supported the Union during the American Civil War
